name: deforming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
deform
[ T ] to spoil the usual and true shape of something: Age deforms the spine.
[ I ]
  chemistry
  specialized If something deforms, its usual shape changes and becomes spoiled: These plastics deform at temperatures of over 90°C.
